In addition to selecting gifts for themselves to open during the holidays, all of the students were inspired by Brandon’s generosity and made sure to select gifts for their parents and siblings—making sure everyone had presents to unwrap on Christmas morning. The players on the girls basketball team have created a great sense of unity this season, and have pushed each other to embody what it looks like to be true student athletes. Girls are lined up outside at 6:45am for practice before school, and have learned grit, teamwork, and determination in our early morning sessions. Team members hold each other accountable on and off the court in regards to academics, behavior and general well-being. This team has given a lot of our players the motivation to truly want to go to school each day, for they know there is a team of girls counting on them and a game waiting to be played each week.

Shout out to Coach Jessica Worthman for leading this team.
